name: Neelofar Manne
text: The movie was a true cinematic experience.

name: Rania Rajan
text: The movie was a true cinematic experience. The movie was a revelation in storytelling. I was left in awe of the creativity and imagination on display.

name: Nehmat Sule
text: The movie was a true joy to watch. Every scene was beautifully shot. The movie kept me guessing until the very end.

name: Manjari Ramaswamy
text: I couldn't take my eyes off the screen. The movie was a true cinematic gem.
